name: Blueberry Oats Semolina Laddoo
description: Blueberry oats Semolina Laddoo (Indian Sweet Snack Bites). These sweet treats are something in between a cookie and a truffle, so delicious and easy to make.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons raw granulated turbinado sugar or other equivalent sweetener
6-7  raw cashews broken into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Blend and puree the blueberries with sugar and a Tablespoon of hot water till nicely pureed.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend and puree the blueberries with sugar and a Tablespoon of hot water till nicely pureed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the oats and blend again to get a thick paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the oats and blend again to get a thick paste.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add the butter and heat on medium low heat till it melts.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add the butter and heat on medium low heat till it melts.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cashew pieces and raisins and cook for 2 minutes till cashews start to turn golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cashew pieces and raisins and cook for 2 minutes till cashews start to turn golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the semolina in the pan and roast for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, on medium low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the semolina in the pan and roast for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, on medium low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cardamom powder and blueberry and oats puree and mix well stirring continuously.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cardamom powder and blueberry and oats puree and mix well stirring continuously.

recipeInstructions.text: If the mixture doesnt come together and is too dry, then add a little water or almond milk, Add some coarsely ground oats if too runny.
recipeInstructions.name: If the mixture doesnt come together and is too dry, then add a little water or almond milk, Add some coarsely ground oats if too runny.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off the heat after 2-3 minutes of continuous stirring, when the mixture looks like a dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off the heat after 2-3 minutes of continuous stirring, when the mixture looks like a dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit and cool for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit and cool for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape the mixture into small spheres or flats and serve! I got about 8 small inch rounds! Store in airtight container in the refrigerator for a few days.
